<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/healthcheck"}

Checks the Web3Signer server health status. Confirms if Web3Signer is healthy. Not used by validator clients.


<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"System is healthy","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"status":{"type":"string","description":"health status"},"checks":{"type":"array","description":"list of status checks","items":{"properties":{"id":{"type":"string","description":"status id"},"status":{"type":"string","description":"health status"}}}},"outcome":{"type":"string","description":"the overall outcome of health check"}},"title":"HealthCheck"}}}},"503":{"description":"At least one procedure is unhealthy","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"status":{"type":"string","description":"health status"},"checks":{"type":"array","description":"list of status checks","items":{"properties":{"id":{"type":"string","description":"status id"},"status":{"type":"string","description":"health status"}}}},"outcome":{"type":"string","description":"the overall outcome of health check"}},"title":"HealthCheck"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
